content: {"version":2,"machineId":"567f7075-03fc-4fb3-a41a-64c7dfe2661e","content":"{\"linux\":\"// Place your key bindings in this file to override the defaultsauto[]\\n[\\n    {\\n        \\\"key\\\": \\\"ctrl+shift+[Backslash]\\\",\\n        \\\"command\\\": \\\"workbench.action.terminal.toggleTerminal\\\",\\n        \\\"when\\\": \\\"terminal.active\\\"\\n    },\\n    {\\n        \\\"key\\\": \\\"ctrl+shift+[Equal]\\\",\\n        \\\"command\\\": \\\"-workbench.action.terminal.toggleTerminal\\\",\\n        \\\"when\\\": \\\"terminal.active\\\"\\n    }\\n]\"}"}
